mapper.insert: insert into DS_FLOW_PI (ID, YWLSH, SBLSH, ALIAS, FLOWID, DEPLOYID, PIDAY, PIDAYTYPE, PISTART, PIEND, PIUPSTART, PIUPEND, STATUS, CACCOUNT, CNAME, PIALIAS) values (#{id}, #{ywlsh}, #{sblsh}, #{alias}, #{flowid}, #{deployid}, #{piday}, #{pidaytype}, #{pistart}, null#{piend}, #{piupstart}, #{piupend}, #{status}, #{caccount}, #{cname}, #{pialias})
mapper.update: update DS_FLOW_PI set STATUS=#{status}, PIEND=#{piend}, PIALIAS=#{pialias} where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select ID, YWLSH, SBLSH, ALIAS, FLOWID, DEPLOYID, PIDAY, PIDAYTYPE, PISTART, PIEND, PIUPSTART, PIUPEND, STATUS, CACCOUNT, CNAME, PIALIAS from DS_FLOW_PI where YWLSH=#{ywlsh}
select ID, YWLSH, SBLSH, ALIAS, FLOWID, DEPLOYID, PIDAY, PIDAYTYPE, PISTART, PIEND, PIUPSTART, PIUPEND, STATUS, CACCOUNT, CNAME, PIALIAS from DS_FLOW_PI where SBLSH=#{sblsh}
select ID, YWLSH, SBLSH, ALIAS, FLOWID, DEPLOYID, PIDAY, PIDAYTYPE, PISTART, PIEND, PIUPSTART, PIUPEND, STATUS, CACCOUNT, CNAME, PIALIAS from DS_FLOW_PI where ID=#{piid}
mapper.insert: insert into DS_FLOW_PI_DATA (ID, PIID, TPREV, TALIAS, TNAME, STATUS, PACCOUNT, PNAME, PTIME, PTYPE, MEMO) values (#{id}, #{piid}, #{tprev}, #{talias}, #{tname}, #{status}, #{paccount}, #{pname}, #{ptime}, #{ptype}, #{memo})
mapper.sql: ID, PIID, YWLSH, SBLSH, FLOWID, FLOWNAME, TALIAS, TNAME, TCOUNT, TPREV, TNEXT, TSTART, TUSER, TUSERS, TMEMO
mapper.insert: insert into DS_FLOW_PI_WAITING () values (#{id}, #{piid}, #{ywlsh}, #{sblsh}, #{flowid}, #{flowname}, #{talias}, #{tname}, #{tcount}, #{tprev}, #{tnext}, #{tstart}, null#{tuser}, null#{tusers}, #{tmemo})
mapper.update: update DS_FLOW_PI_WAITING set TCOUNT=TCOUNT-1, TSTART=#{tstart}, TPRVE=#{tprev} where ID=#{id} and TCOUNT>1
update DS_FLOW_PI_WAITING set TUSER=#{tuser}, TUSERS=null where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select from DS_FLOW_PI_WAITING where PIID=#{piid} and TALIAS=#{talias}
select TALIAS from DS_FLOW_PI_WAITING where PIID=#{piid}
mapper.sql: select from DS_FLOW_PI_WAITING where (TUSER=#{account} or TUSERS like #{account, typeHandler=LikeTypeHandler}) and TCOUNT=1
